text: Are kꞌu ri uj ri xujkojonik che ri utz laj tzij, xujokik pa ri uxlanem, are kꞌu ri man xkikoj taj ri xbꞌix chike xubꞌij:4:3 Salmos 95:11. Xaq jeriꞌ rukꞌ woyawal xinbꞌij chi man koꞌk ta wi pa ri wuxlanem. Jewaꞌ xubꞌij ri Dios rumal xnaꞌtaj che are xtoꞌtajik chubꞌanik ri uchak are xutik ronojel ri uwachulew.
